name: Sock Dodge
description:
A simple game where you collect bubbles and avoid socks. 

Try to beat your high score, my highest on this build is 208, though recorded is 111. 

-------------

Credits (Will be added into the game soon) 

Icon was made by the lovely Lady. https://www.deviantart.com/ladycat06/

I added a tiny border. Cross helped make the Ico files. 

All socks were made by me, Tsukichild. So many socks. 

Gunner sprite was modified by me, from Elthan's self sprite. I suggest you check him out here; https://www.patreon.com/elthen/ The bubble is part of his spectral shield. 

All music tracks are made by Abstraction, http://abstractionmusic.bandcamp.com/

The sound effects were found on freesound.org

-------------

I'll have the download option back in the next update or two. 

If you need any control options, color modes, or have any suggestions though, please drop them below. I'd be happy to look them over!
